name: Death Vulture
description: The Death Vulture is a large monstrosity exuding an aura of horror and decay, with a disgusting body odor and a sharp, deadly beak.
memorable: Its ability to inflict necrotic damage that ages its victims makes it a terrifying foe.
goals: Typically seeks to hunt and debilitate prey for food.
relations: Often found among necromantic creatures and in dark, desolate habitats.
environment: Commonly inhabits graveyards, battlefields, and other areas of death.
strengths: Exceptional physical power with high Strength and Constitution; adept at cooperative attacks.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence and Charisma limit social interaction and strategic planning.
attacks: Multiattack with lethal strikes from its beak and talons, dealing piercing and slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Decaying Breath releases necrotic energy that causes damage and potential aging.
senses: Has keen sight and smell, granting it advantage on Perception checks related to these senses.
skills: Possesses an average Wisdom, providing reliable perception abilities.
additional_information: Inflicts poison with its awful stench ability.
Gains advantage on attack rolls with allies nearby due to Pack Tactics.
Necrotic and poison damage immunities make it resilient to certain threats.
Average Dexterity does not enhance its agility in combat.
Low Charisma makes it difficult for the Death Vulture to engage socially.
test_queries: menacing flying monster that causes decay
creature that ages victims with breath attack
decaying monster that thrives on death
